display_name: GCE audit log does not contain non-GKE instance creation events

conditions.display_name: Non-GKE instance creation event found in GCE audit log

documentation.content: [Use this link to explore policy events in Logs Viewer](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/viewer?project=${project_id}&minLogLevel=0&expandAll=false&interval=PT1H&advancedFilter=resource.type%3D%22gce_instance%22%20AND%20(protoPayload.methodName%3D%22beta.compute.instances.insert%22%20OR%20protoPayload.methodName%3D%22compute.instances.insert%22)%20AND%20protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail!%3D%${organization_id}@cloudservices.gserviceaccount.com%22)
